fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, plot to scare at someone's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, learn all evil roles present.
- Scaring someone will roleblock them.
- Your target is unaffected.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the continuation of the other holiday. (And also don't kidnap Sandy Claws this time. Mkay?)
